divs: Sighting DetailsWe were walking back from the store. My daughter is an astronomy buff so she waswatching the sky. She said look at the strange plane. I looked and a light inthe sky was traveling VERY fast from the north. it was soon joined by two otherlights. one from the SW and one from the NE as they flew over our area theyjoined together into one object and flew out towards the atlantic. Normally iwould not have thought about writing but they moved so fast. they cleared ourview from north to SE in just about 6 or 7 seconds and then when they lookedlike they became one object my daughter insisted i tell someone.
Summary: Three Glowing Lights Form into One Big Light
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in North Myrtle Beach
There were no other sightings in North Myrtle Beach on or around October 15th 2003
